Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: This cafe is next to Westerpark. The food and coffee were good, but the service was quite slow and the coffee was no longer hot by the time it reached us, twice. There were signs everywhere saying to order inside, but inside they refused and said we must order outside. The outdoor seating area is very nice.

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: Tasty and healthy food. I did not expect it to be SO good, honestly. Recommended!

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: Hip but relaxed place. Nice interior. Great choice for breakfast if you have time to spend I recommend to pick more dishes to share. Food is delicious but portions can be smaller than you would expect from the price tag.

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: If you want to eat a fresh and healthy meal in a relaxed and inspiring environment, this is the place to go! Also a good spot to chill with coffee and cake after a stroll through Westerpark.

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: Delicious & healthy food for everyone. The carrot ginger soup is my fav! And I love the terrace outside, lots of space, no traffic and a little bit away from all the hustle and bustle :)

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: One of the few places in Amsterdam where love for food and quality come together in such a healthy and harmonious way. Great vibe, lovely setting, beautiful interious and super service!

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: "Cafe Sage" is beautiful name for a place where I had a moment of rest after great yinyoga session. The food was tasty, nicely prepared and wel served!

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: Average food, poor service. Not a nice atmosphere either for a cafe. A little too pretentious for a cafe in Westerpark.

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: Good quality food & drinks. Nice place and vibes.

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: For the vegans a beautiful place but also if you are not vegan / vegeterian you can eat delicious.

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: Horrible !  I got food poisoning ,  Never eat there  +  poor service

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: 30mins and no service. Very odd. One star seems too high

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: (Translated by Google) A hidden gem in Amsterdam where you can drink a coffee in peace on the spacious terrace in the sun, but also enjoy a great menu with the most delicious dishes. The cafe feels like a living room inside. Nice atmosphere ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) At caf√© Sage it is nice to sit down, especially after a yoga class. Sit inside with a fresh pressed ginger tea and breakfast. Or enjoy a healthy lunch outside on the terrace on the terrace. Salads not only look ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Good service, very nice service and good food. Especially the guidance in making the right choices based on allergies is very good. The muffin was not quite my taste, but the banana bread is very tasty again. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice cafe to enjoy healthy delicacies. Nicely decorated, peaceful atmosphere. And when the sun shines really a great place to sit outside! ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice cozy tent! Lovely location right by the park, especially now during the cool sunny winter days it is nice to have a bite to eat or something to drink! ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Lovely place, super tasty food + drinks and nice people! There is a good, calm atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sage
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious eaten in a nice, relaxing session. Beautiful place to relax in the middle of the city ‚Ä¶
